name: TypeScript Full-Stack Development
description: Complete TypeScript development stack for building modern full-stack applications with Node.js, React, and database integration

packages.reason: TypeScript best practices, strict mode, and type safety patterns
Node.js server development with Express/Fastify patterns
React with TypeScript, hooks, and component patterns
PostgreSQL/MySQL query optimization and schema design
REST API design patterns and OpenAPI documentation

name: Package Manager Development
description: Tools and patterns for building package managers, CLI tools, and developer tooling with Node.js/TypeScript

packages.reason: CLI design patterns with Commander.js and interactive prompts
Package publishing, versioning, and npm registry management
Semantic versioning and dependency resolution strategies
Safe file operations, tar archives, and directory management
Configuration files, dotfiles, and user settings management

name: Registry & Marketplace Backend
description: Build package registries, marketplaces, and content distribution platforms with authentication, search, and analytics

packages.reason: Fastify framework for high-performance API development
Advanced PostgreSQL features: triggers, views, full-text search
Redis caching strategies and session management
GitHub OAuth integration and user authentication
Full-text search with Elasticsearch integration
Usage analytics, download tracking, and metrics collection

name: Complete Testing & Quality
description: Comprehensive testing suite including unit tests, integration tests, E2E tests, and code quality tools

packages.reason: Vitest unit and integration testing with coverage
End-to-end browser testing with Playwright
TypeScript-specific testing patterns and type testing
REST API testing strategies and contract testing
Coverage reporting and quality gates

name: Claude Code Skills & MCP

name: Web Scraping & Automation

Web scraping patterns with cheerio/puppeteer
Rate limiting strategies and retry logic

Parse and extract data from markdown files
